originalShowTitle: อังคารคลุมโปง: เอ็กซ์ตรีม
overview: Inspired by the Thai horror radio show "Angkhan Khlumpong," this series presents eight stories based on real-life experiences shared by listeners.

1.episodeOverview: Following her sister's death, a young woman copes with grief, only to discover that her mother has adopted a doll that seems to have a life of its own.
With her job at risk, a tailor scrambles to alter an old dress in time for her client's wedding. But the garment's dreadful history begins to haunt her.
When a young man finds a sealed room in his new home and discovers its terrifying story, the horrors of the past slowly creep into his family's lives.
An encounter with a vengeful goddess leaves two lovers with only one way to avoid certain death: reveal every secret they've been hiding from each other.
A teacher visits her missing student's unusual family and quickly becomes entangled in a hazy world of hallucinations and occult rituals.
A man with a drug addiction finds himself drawn to a neighbor, who slips him a cryptic note with odd instructions. Soon, mysterious events plague him.
After vanishing under strange circumstances, a grandmother suddenly returns home. But her family realizes that she may no longer be who she was.
A mother must find a way to protect her young daughter when an eerie story from a radio program begins to mirror their reality.
